Objects

Class Perishable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Objects.Item
      • Objects.Perishable

  • public class Perishable
extends Item
    the Perishable class extends from the Item class is used to differentiate goods that need a temperature.
    Author:
    Jake Ralph

    • Constructor Detail

      • Perishable

        public Perishable(java.lang.String name,
                  double cost,
                  double sellPrice,
                  int reorderPoint,
                  int reorderAmount,
                  int maxTemp)
        Creates a Perishable Item
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Item
        cost - The cost of the Item
        sellPrice - The re-sale price of the Item
        reorderPoint - The point at which more stock needs to be ordered at
        reorderAmount - The amount to be reordered
        maxTemp - The maximum temperature the Item needs to be kept at
